remarks: Definition of double restricted existential uniqueness ("exactly one ` x ` and exactly one ` y ` "), analogous to ~ 2eu4 with the additional requirement that the restricting classes are not empty (which is not necessary as shown in ~ 2reu4 ).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
statement:
2reu4a $p |- ( ( A =/= (/) /\ B =/= (/) ) -> ( ( E! x e. A E. y e. B ph /\ E! y e. B E. x e. A ph ) <-> ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph /\ E. z e. A E. w e. B A. x e. A A. y e. B ( ph -> ( x = z /\ y = w ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d ph w z $.
